chapters.title: Chapter 1:  Eastward the Wind Blew
chapters.info: Beralna, p. 78—A Maiden of the Spear. She is a bony redhead with blue eyes and a feral grin. She traveled with Rand in Arad Doman. She demanded to have Power-wrought spearheads made, “as smiths can make four spearheads for every sword.”
